Highlights.name: A Variety of Programs
Highlights.description: The Indian Institute of Management Bangalore (IIMB) offers a variety of programs including degree-granting programmes, a diploma programme, certificate programmes and executive education programmes [1]. This means that IIMB can provide students with a well-rounded education at all levels of their academic journey.

Highlights.name: Focus on Research
Highlights.description: IIMB faculty generate knowledge through cutting-edge research in all functional areas of management [1]. This suggests that IIMB is a research-oriented institution that is committed to producing new knowledge in the field of business.

Highlights.name: World-Class Infrastructure
Highlights.description: IIMB has world-class infrastructure that facilitates excellence in teaching, research, consulting and other professional activities [1]. This suggests that IIMB provides students with a supportive learning environment that has all the resources they need to succeed.

enhanced_description: IIMB is a premier institute for management education and research, known for integrating classroom knowledge with practical corporate experience. It leverages its highly accomplished faculty and world-class infrastructure to offer a variety of programs, including degree-granting, diploma, certificate, and executive education programs, alongside pre-doctoral fellowships. The institute emphasizes cutting-edge research in all functional areas of management and acts as a catalyst for entrepreneurial activity. IIMB works with the EFMD Quality Improvement System and aligns with business objectives such as building a more diverse and inclusive workforce. As a corporate LMS and training & development company, IIMB focuses on diversity and inclusion and utilizes learning analytics.
